On july 17, 2014
EoNightcore
VersatioWe had like twelve dozen different militaries, I lost track of who was who.

Right......

Earthlings
The Council: A group of 5 (now 4) of the strongest men and women in the world. Imagine the Illuminati, except instead of conquering the world, they defend it from hidden threats.

SDF: Space Defense Fleet, I'm not sure where it came from, but it was probably funded by the council.

NADO/NATO: This group defends North Atlantic, meaning they protect both North America, and Europa. The most stable of the 4 Defensive Alliances. However, the nations in this group are quite stubborn and like to complain America is trying to be the leader of the group. (NYPD, American Military, etc)

APDA: Asian and Pacific Defensive Alliance, it's a good alliance, but a flimsy one at most, most of the countries here don't like each other too much. (Japan, South Korea, etc...)

AM: Army of Mohammed, they defend North Africa, while somewhat effective, just like APDA, they suffer from mistrust due to the various groups that hate each other. They also defend most of the Middle Eastern area, Israel being an exception.

AA: Army of Africa, sister organization to the AM, they Defend South Africa, and suffer from some of the same problems as it's sister organization.

LAD: Latin American Defensive, it's more stable then the AA or the APDA, but it suffers from corruption due to the drug trade and such.

Aliens
Alien Invasion Force: They're here for a reason, and they won't tell mankind why.

Mush: The Mush are part of the Alien Invasion Force, but they serve their own interests.

Other
???: The people the crew of Dr.Winner's ship came from.

Crossbow Republic: A nation created by John "Crossbow" Fletcher, he has cast off his earthling heritage and began an Exodus to a new planet (the name of which I have forgotten, but will rename). Most of it's people come from Crossbow Technologies and Military, along with several elvish and half-breed people taken from their homes in Europa.

EoNightcore

The Mush Queen stood before the Uber Ethereal.

Uber Ethereal: Ftah xo cou fanh? (What do you want?)

Mush Queen: Couk Tolinejj, I fijt ho vige ouh pc vooxzce ho cou. (Your Holiness, I wish to give out my goodbye to you.)

Uber Ethereal: Anx ftc ij htah? Ake cou teaxinv xofn ho Eakht ho yopzah hte tupanj? (And why is that? Are you heading down to Earth to combat the humans?)

Mush Queen: No, because this.

The Mush Queen stabbed the Uber Ethereal, infecting him with a spore.

Uber Ethereal: *Gasp* Tof, tof youlx cou? *Gasp* Zehkac pe lire htij? (*Gasp* How, how could you? *Gasp* Betray me like this?)

The Uber Ethereal collapsed. The Mush Queen's hand slid out.

Mush Queen: Ah god, speaking in alien sucks ass, well, whatever.

The Mush Queen proceeded to touch the Uber Ethereal's dead body, and his body was absorbed in a very messy way, into hers.

Mush Queen: AHHHH I HAVE NOT FELT POWER LIKE THIS SINCE I BECAME A MUSH QUEEN!

The Mush Queen saw a Sectoid who had witnessed it all, she quickly extend out her hand, and the Sectoid flew to her.

Mush Queen: Hello little one, you shall be my newst subject.

The Mush Queen tested out her powers, mind-control, teleportation, telepathy, and last but not least, she exploded the head of the Sectoid just by thinking about it.

Mush Queen: Oh god!

The Mush Queen felt a rush of emotions she had not felt before, and t-

On july 17, 2014
[8356287]

The simulator was incredibly realistic. Steve was inside the cockpit of a fighter jet! He reached out and gripped the yoke - it even felt real! But the controls were very different from his cargo plane.

"I'll bet they're recording this." he thought to himself. He didn't want to seem like he didn't know what he was doing, so he quickly began going through his standard pre-flight checklist.

  • Ignition off
  • Master power on
  • Fuel gauges: full
  • . . .

When he reached the stage when he would normally inspect the aircraft, he assumed that the simulated jet would have no flaws. He flipped a few more switches and taxied out to the runway, then fired up the engines.

Steve: Alright. Let's see what this baby can do.

He opened up the throttle and...

1-20 the jet exploded.
21-40 the engines died.
41-60 a warning alarm went off.
61-80 the flight controller began screaming at him.
81-100 he was suddenly startled by the feeling of a hand on his shoulder.
58
On july 17, 2014
[8356287]

*BZZT-BZZT-BZZT-BZZT-*


BEGINNER MODE
SCENARIO ABORT
MISSION FAILURE

TRY AGAIN?

Steve felt like a dumbass. He pulled the helmet off in frustration and shoved it back on the table. He leaned back in his chair and let his arms dangle, staring at the ceiling.

After a moment, he wondered when Charles would return. He was getting hungry. He walked to the door and looked out into the hallway.

Steve: The cafeteria has got to be around here somewhere...
On july 17, 2014
[5367939]

Steve notices a sticky note fall from the doorway. float, float

Contents of the note: It seems to be a rough map to the cafeteria. At the end of the note, written is "Figure you might get hungry at some point, i'm going to be awhile, signed Charles."

If Steve turns the note over he reads this: "Oh, by the way, always inspect the plane, they love messing with recruits on that simulator. Don't forget to radio control tower either...."

On july 17, 2014
[8356287]

Jessica was walking down a hallway with a young man in a lab coat, with spiky blue hair and a nose ring.

Unusual scientist: My colleagues and I have been discussing the theoretical ramifications of your findings. We're terribly eager to - "pick your brain" - as it were. I understand you're overdue for some R&R, but please do come by the lab as soon as possible.

Jessica: Um... yes... of course. Where are we going?

The nerdy punk grinned and pushed up his glasses.

Unusual scientist: You're lucky. Most of the evacuees are sleeping on cots in the cafeteria, but you've been given your own private room. It's just down the hall here. But don't expect much. It's actually a briefing room, and you still only get a cot. But we tried to make it cozy.

She couldn't tell if he was trying to flirt with her. They reached the end of the hallway and he gestured toward an open door.

Unusual scientist: You'll find a fresh change of clothes on the bed, along with a proper laboratory frock that should suit you much better than that... dirty... ROBE you're wearing.

Jessica blushed and lowered her head. She walked into the room, with the strange man following right behind her. Suddenly she turned around.

Jessica: UH- What was your name?

Unusual scientist: Oh - so sorry - I'm Colin. But my friends call me Dr. Pierce.

Jessica's brow furrowed quizzically, then she shook her head.

Jessica: Colin, it was SO nice to meet you, and I hate to cut this short, but can you just tell me where the showers are?

Colin: It's quite alright. The showers are across from the cafeteria. We passed by there on the way. You can't miss it.

Jessica laid Darwin on the bed and scooped up the clothes. She closed the door, with her foot blocking the frantically meowing feline from following her.

Colin: Here is my card. Call as soon as you can, and I'll give you directions to the Science Building.

Jessica: Uhh.... thanks. I'll do that.

Colin smiled and walked away. Jessica waited until he was far enough ahead that she wouldn't have to talk to him any more, then followed him toward the showers.
On july 17, 2014
[8356287]

Steve reached an intersection. He glanced down at the sticky note, then turned it sideways. He looked both ways, then turned left and walked down the hall. A crowd of voices grew louder as he approached the cafeteria.

Ahead, in the distance, a woman was walking toward him. Just as they reached each other, he suddenly recognized her.

It was HER!

Oh SHIT!
On july 17, 2014
[8356287]

Jessica peered into the wide doorway to the cafeteria. Rows of cots crowded the room, and people were milling about, sitting or lying down. Everyone looked haggared. The tables were folded up against one wall.

She turned around to find the showers, but suddenly froze.

[ editorial note: excessive profanity ]

THERE HE WAS.

The psychopath who had kidnapped her from her home, still wearing her bathrobe, and forced her to unlock the zoo - the motherfucker who had crammed her trained elephants into a cargo van and then dropped them out his GODDAMN PLANE - that peice of shit that kept her starving in a CAGE for two days - that SON OF A BITCH was standing right in front of her!!

Jessica's eyes widened and her nostrils flared. She dropped the clothes.

YOU!!

Steve stood in speechless shock.

She reached into the pocket of her robe and gripped the straight-razor.

TIME SLOWED DOWN.

In one continuous movement, she leaped into the air, with glistening brunette hair swirling above her, tackled the man to the ground and brought the blade to his neck.

1-10 She immediately slits his throat.
11-100 She hesitates.
75

The Mush Queen was sleeping in a cocoon.
All that biomass she has managed to get from killing the councilors, also gave her their strength, and powers.
And with this new-found powers, she knew her old body could not hold it. So she decided to change, and thus, she slept.
And if she were ever to awake, all life on earth would possibly never see the daylight ever again.

Inside her powers fluctuated wildly, shifting the world around her. She became a being comparable to a goddess, and as such, she knew who was going to kill her on day, and she planned, she planned to kill them first.

1-5 No influence, her powers are still too weak.

She threw on her dirty old robe and opened the door.

Charles cautiously looked back toward her. "We're still trying to figure that out. They're taking some samples for analysis. Stay alert, we don't know how many of them there are."

Jessica nodded and went back into the shower stall. She changed into the camouflage jumpsuit they had given her. It was too big. She rolled up her cuffs and then pulled the lab coat on. Steve appears to have entirely forgotten about his powers. He attempted to escape the military multiple times, and then got recruited by NADO, then Jessica saw him and tried to kill him. He too was atttaced by a Nightmare Creature shortly after that, he survived as well.
